title: Border (working Title), a photographic project
abstractText: 'Border' will focus on Iranians in 'exile' & their untold stories, using the codes of the documentary genre, yet deviating from the usual generic approach. Combining fact & fiction, the project will consist of a series of large photographs reminiscent of film still/posters, each portraying a 'fragment' of a story of an individual in exile. The term exile is used here broadly to cover people who were 'forced' to leave, regardless of where they were politically active or not.
